characters.story: See how the foot forms way? It shouts "Dao!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture to guide taking form - it whispers "Dao" with vivid energy!
Picture speedy taking form - it shouts "Shun!" with vivid energy!
The strokes unite to show to create, shouting "Zao!" sharply!
"Shun, all clear?" the patrol questioned, walking around the perimeter.
She wandered the wide streets, strolling and shopping.
The strokes unite to show car, singing "Chuh!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
"Lian, where next?" One car after another questioned their route.
A lotus grass connected questions "Lian? Why float?" curiously!
"Are we ahead?" the boat questioned, walking in front.
This character represents shears, whispering "Jian" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show to transport, singing "Shoo!" cheerfully!
"Yoo, too far?" they questioned, walking beyond the limit to exceed it.
Like a mouth, this character means each and shouts "Guh!" spoken through parted lips!
Like a tree, this character means pattern and asks "Guh? What style?"!
This character represents guest, shouting "Kuh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Uh, why such a big forehead?" The guest's page-sized head was surprising!
This character represents summer, shouting "Shya!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Like water, this character means l.a. and shouts "Luo!" like ripples spreading across a pond!
Picture grass beside water: that's to fall, shouting "Luo!" sharply!
